description.narrative: The Project seeks to engage the Youth and the communities in which they live more productively, increase their positive interactionamong themselves and build and or improve their skills for self-reliance. The Youth are obliged in this project to steer transformation of their own communities in terms of development and peaceful living amongst themselves and other communities. DA4PR plans to execute 03 program outputs namely; Output 1: Economic empowerment of Host community and Refugee Youth. Output 2: Improve positive interaction and talent development among Youth. Output 3: Engaging Youth to support community Initiatives and or development. The Fourth output caters for coordination and collaboration for effective project implementation. The implementation period is planned between 1st April to 30th November 2019. Project planned to be implemented in seven villages of Ofua Zone and Omugo six village.

participating-org.narrative: Dynamic Action for Peace and Rehabi DA 4 PR

Dynamic Action for peace and rehabilitation (DA4PR) was before called Dynamic Drama group. It was best known for drama and music assource of stress management. The group was started by only two (2) active visionary youths who aimed at restoring hope/peace and rebuilding lives of those affected with traumatic torture to socialize and share freely. However, through massive mobilization by the two (2) active youths, the number increased from two (2) to eighty three (83) whereby 36 are males and 47 are females. Therefore upon seeing the increase in the number of the member backed up by the desire and willingness to cause positive impact in the community,the group came up with rules and regulations to guide them which was later amended in to a constitution or the group. At the mean time the group rrealized that there were potential human resources that can run the group they came with the idea to register the group as a community Based Organization (CBO) which they sat down to re-amend the constitution and change the name of the group from Dynamic Drama group to Dynamic Action For Peace And Rehabilitation (DA4PR) where they elected seven (7) board members with compositionof one chairperson, one vice chairperson, one secretary, one treasurer, and three committee members with roles defined in the constitution. After the formation of the board, the group members had contributions for registrations of the CBO at the sub-county of which there was the award of certificate to operate legally in Uriama Sub-county. The organization have got eleven staffs who voluntarily run the day today activities of the organization where five (5) are males and six (6) are females.
